history.proof: intros k l H. induction l as [|hd tl IH]. - contradiction. - simpl. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference H' was not found in the current environment.
The reference H' was not found in the current environment.

original: intros k l H. induction l as [|hd tl IH]. - intros contra. contradiction. - simpl. intros [H'|H']. + injection H' as H'. rewrite <- H'. left. + right. apply IH, H. apply H'.
